name: The Burger Ninja
description:
Kick your way through Taksigrilli, Raatihuoneentori, Kajaanin rautatieasema, Poliisi- ja oikeustalo, Kotipizza Kasarminkatu, Kajaanin veturitalli, Kaukametsän kongressikeskus, Kajaanin lentoasema, Kajaanin keskustan kävelykatu, Kajaanin linnanrauniot and Kätönlahden venepaikka to become the Ultimate Burger Ninja Champion in this two-player-only beat 'em up!

Code, music, sound, gfx and rotoscoping by Aleksi Eeben
Original song by Eppu Normaali

Released at Zoo Party 2022, placed #1 in Game Making Compo

UP Punch
LEFT/RIGHT Walk
DOWN Crouch
DOWN+L/R Low punch
UP+L/R Turn and punch
FIRE+UP Roundhouse kick
FIRE+L/R Front kick/turn
FIRE+DOWN Low kick/sweep

Player 1: Joystick in port 1 (in browser: plug in a USB controller)
Player 2: Joystick in port 2 (in browser: cursor keys, Z = fire)

A well-landed roundhouse kick can do double the damage!

SUPER NINJA CHARGE is activated when there is a Last Ninja style break in the music. Both players start flashing, immediately recover +3 hit points and all fighting happens at double speed for a moment.

The embedded emulator is http://lvllvl.com/c64/. Sound may be a little choppy if not using Chrome.
